title: Servers having issues tonight or is it me?
body: Just wondering if anyone is having issues tonight. My fps has dropped to 40 from the usual 110 and ping has been spiking during these times :C

replies.body:
Don't know why someone downvoted this, reasonable question.

Honestly me and a few other people in my group have been haveing troubles, random frame rate drops, bug splats, it's been weird since the draven release.
It could be that they are about to remove League Of Draven. I was having problems too
